title: Surrendering... In ranked
body:
Okay okay, so  i understand that some people think this game is 100% lost... And i completely understand that, sure they want to surrender but i have one of those mind sets in RANKED, that you never ever surrender no matter what. Ranked is more competitive and the aim is to win, so why surrender? Okay they might have a 18/2 Caitlyn or even a 21/3 Kat but to me that does not matter. As soon as I see a surrender vote go up for my cursor instantly moves to the NO button. I feel really strongly about this because (especially in lower elos) the winning team will easily start to throw, whether is be from being out of position or our team just having a positive mind set, but seriously surrendering is simply giving up and saying there is no way to win...

R.I.P DFG

replies.body:
Yep, there's always a chance that the enemy team are gonna throw. In lower elos, they start to get cocky and begin turret diving you or attempt to 1v5

I have won games like this.

It happens some times they mess up in teamfight and let you wint the game or minions are pushing and can take inhib tower and inhib because they are to busy trying to fight then someone has to clear so you engage on a 4v5 and win
sure there are exceptions to the rule but when i see a game is clearly lost (4v5, no map control, vs scaling team comp etc.) i would rather save my efforts and put them into the next game
If you are losing super hard you probably deserve to lose the game anyway.
Unless of course you are super fed and think you can carry your team, in that case I wouldn't surrender either.
